item.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary Benson: Annual tariff revenue is expected to reach $300 billionOn July 22, U.S. Treasury Secretary Benson said that tariff revenues would be "huge" and could account for 1% of GDP. Annual tariff revenues are expected to reach $300 billion. [PANews]

item.title: Irish firm SMX plans to include crypto assets such as Bitcoin in treasury reservesIrish company Security Matters (SMX) plans to start using Bitcoin and other crypto assets as treasury reserves to increase asset value and hedge against inflation. [Foresight News]

item.title: The second phase of the Gate "Red Bull Racing Tour" is in full swing, with transaction volume exceeding $10.00B and more than 21,000 participantsOn July 22, according to official news, the second phase of the "Red Bull Racing Tour" launched by Gate on July 12 has continued to gain popularity. Before the deadline, the total transaction volume has exceeded $10.00B, the number of participants has exceeded 21,000, and 1,000 GT rewards have been successfully unlocked. The total prize pool for this phase is as high as 20,000 GT. Participants can impact the rankings by completing spot and contract tasks, and not only have the opportunity to share generous rewards, but also have the opportunity to win tickets to watch the F1 Grand Prix worth tens of thousands of dollars. Join the Red Bull Racing Tour now to start a speed feast where the world of crypto meets the passion of top racing, and chase the peak of glory together. [PANews]

item.title: Japanese textile material company Kitabo announces plans to purchase $5.40 million worth of BitcoinAccording to the official announcement, Japanese textile materials company Kitabo has announced plans to purchase 800 million yen (approximately $5.40M) worth of Bitcoin as part of its new financial strategy. [Odaily]

item.title: Multi-chain wallet TokenPocket now supports using USDD to pay transaction feesMulti-chain self-custody wallet TokenPocket announced that after previously adding support for USDT as a transfer "network fee" on TRON, it now supports the decentralized stablecoin USDD as a Gas Fee payment method. When users transfer via the TRON network, they can directly use USDD to pay transaction fees and enjoy limited-time transaction fee subsidies, achieving "more savings with every transaction." Currently, TokenPocket serves over 25.00 million users worldwide, with over 3.50 million monthly active users, and its business covers more than 200 countries and regions. The new support for USDD to pay transaction fees will inevitably further enrich the application scenarios of USDD 2.0. [Odaily]

item.title: Archax Acquires German Digital Asset Firm DDA to Expand European Crypto ETP FootprintUK-based digital asset exchange Archax will acquire Deutsche Digital Assets (DDA), a regulated German crypto asset management company, to strengthen its business presence in major European financial markets such as the UK, Germany, and France. DDA currently manages approximately $70.00M in assets and focuses on distributing crypto exchange-traded products (ETPs) through European banks and asset management institutions. This acquisition will bring new licenses to Archax, including portfolio management and investment advisory under German BaFin regulation, enabling it to better serve EU institutional clients. (CoinDesk) [Odaily]

item.title: Strategy Announces Proposed Initial Public Offering of STRC SharesStrategy (NASDAQ: MSTR , STRK , STRF , STRD ) announced plans to issue 5,000,000 shares of variable rate Series A perpetual extended preferred stock ( STRC stock) and conduct an initial public offering, subject to market and other conditions. The proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including Bitcoin acquisitions and working capital. The initial annualized monthly dividend rate for STRC stock is 9.00% , and the company has the right to adjust the dividend rate in accordance with relevant regulations. Morgan Stanley, Barclays, Moelis & Company and TD Securities serve as joint bookrunners for this offering. The offering will be made through an effective registration statement with the SEC and will be sold only by prospectus. [PANews]

item.title: Glassnode: Ethereum buyers took profits near $2,520.00, but still hold nearly 2.00M ETHA heatmap of Ethereum's cost basis distribution released by blockchain data analysis firm Glassnode shows that since July 1, buyers have been taking profits significantly around $2,520.00, and the red area is gradually weakening. However, these buyers still hold nearly 2.00M ETH. [Foresight News]

item.title: DWF Labs co-founder: Falcon Finance funds have all been withdrawn from CEX, and the new transparency page will be launched this weekOn July 22, Andrei Grachev, co-founder of DWF Labs and co-founder of Falcon Finance, wrote that Falcon Finance has withdrawn all funds from centralized exchanges and obtained a confirmation letter from the auditor. Currently, Falcon Finance is designing the structure of a new transparency page, which is expected to be launched this week. [PANews]

item.title: Strategy's per-share equivalent of Bitcoin has increased by 20.8% since the beginning of the year, TD Cowen reiterates MSTR's target price of $680.00Investment bank TD Cowen stated that the premium for Strategy is reasonable. After increasing its holdings by another 6,220 BTC last week, one share of MSTR stock now corresponds to 20.8% more Bitcoin than on January 1. TD Cowen reiterated its $680.00 target price for MSTR stock and expects that by 2027, Strategy will hold nearly 900,000 BTC, and the flywheel strategy of Bitcoin treasury will continue to provide it with momentum. (The Block) [Odaily Planet Daily]

item.title:
Between Rolex, Benner, and Buffett: What is the Crypto Market Trying to Tell Us?The present month so far has been quite bullish for the crypto market. Bitcoin (BTC) hit a new all-time high just over a week ago. Ethereum (ETH) is also continuing to rally, reaching multi-month highs. In fact, in the past 24 hours alone, the total market capitalization has increased by $41 billion. Amid this, market watchers are increasingly anticipating the next move. Analysts are now examining luxury watch prices, historical market cycles, and classic valuation metrics to gauge the market’s trajectory.
How Luxury Watches Reflect Market Psychology: The ‘Rolex Indicator’ Explained
Major technical indicators, chart patterns, the Fear and Greed Index, Bitcoin dominance, and DXY performance have become increasingly popular tools for predicting trends in the crypto market. However, some analysts contend that behavioral indicators offer a more accurate and insightful view of the market. In a detailed post on X (formerly Twitter), a pseudonymous analyst, Pix, highlighted the ‘Rolex Indicator’ as a potential tool for predicting the market top. The analyst explained that the Rolex Indicator gauges market psychology by examining the user behavior around luxury goods like watches. As new money enters the market, individuals purchase status symbols like watches to display their success. Pix noted that watch prices have historically lagged behind crypto bull runs, peaking only after widespread wealth distribution, such as during the 2021 NFT boom. This spike marked the top of the bull market. The analyst added that Bitcoin hit a record peak and many altcoins have seen double-digit surges over the past month. Yet, luxury watches haven’t yet followed suit.
Another analyst, Atlas, also shared a similar sentiment. He emphasized that while greed is increasing, it hasn’t hit its full potential just yet. Furthermore, the analyst outlined more behavioral signs. He pointed out that rising “flex culture” on crypto Twitter, profit screenshots, and job-quitting posts are signs of shifting market sentiment. While there are more posts like this than six months ago, it’s still below 2021 levels.
Benner or Buffett: The Debate Over the Market’s Next Big Move
Meanwhile, the Benner Cycle, a historical model rooted in recurring market patterns, also offers a similar outlook. According to the cycle, the market has not peaked yet and could do so by 2026. Therefore, it indicates that there’s still room to grow. This suggests that the current market conditions could represent a phase of accumulation and positioning before a significant upward movement.
Nonetheless, the Warren Buffett Indicator introduces a note of caution. This metric compares the country’s stock market’s total capitalization to its Gross Domestic Product (GDP). Warren Buffett has referred to this ratio as It is used to assess whether a stock market is overvalued or undervalued relative to its underlying economy. A value above 100% usually indicates that the former is the case. Notably, in July, the ratio exceeded 200%. It could be a signal that the market is in a bubble or that stock prices are excessively inflated. This raises concerns about a potential correction in risk assets, including cryptocurrencies.
The juxtaposition of these indicators highlights a market at a crossroads. The Rolex Indicator and Benner Cycle point to ongoing growth, while the Buffett Indicator warns of overheating. The crypto market’s next move may hinge on whether confidence translates into speculative excess or triggers a broader reassessment of valuations.

item.title: Gate will list Uranium.io (XU3O8) for spot trading, and launch HODLer Airdrop and trading competition with a total prize pool of 10,962 XU3O8According to the official announcement, Gate will launch Uranium.io (XU3O8) spot trading on July 24 at 16:00 (UTC+8). To give back to platform users, XU3O8 HODLer Airdrop and trading competition are launched, with a total prize pool of 10,962 XU3O8. Gate has now launched the 272nd HODLer Airdrop, which will end on July 24 at 14:00 (UTC+8). Users holding 1 GT can participate in the free airdrop and share 4,474 XU3O8. Gate will launch the Uranium.io (XU3O8) trading competition from July 24 at 16:00 to July 31 at 16:00 (UTC+8). Users can share 6,488 XU3O8 by completing spot trading, inviting friends, and completing the first order exclusive task for new users. [Odaily News]

item.title: Institutions: US Treasury sustainability will be a key issue in the second half of this yearAramea Asset Management analyst Felix Herrmann said in a report that the debate over U.S. debt sustainability could dominate U.S. markets in the second half of this year. The chief economist said this would lead to upside risks for long-term U.S. Treasury yields. He said that the U.S. debt will increase significantly in the short term, partly due to the so-called "Big, Beautiful Bill." (Golden Ten) [Odaily News]

item.title: Futu Launches ChinaAMC Tokenized Money Fund, Exploring On-Chain Subscription and Redemption with Stablecoin Application ScenariosFutu Holdings (FUTU) and China Asset Management (Hong Kong) have announced a partnership in the Web3.0 field. Futu will be the exclusive broker to list tokenized money market funds issued by China Asset Management (Hong Kong) on its platform, covering three currencies: HKD, RMB, and USD. Currently, the HKD product has been launched on the Futu platform, and the USD product is expected to be launched this week. The two parties plan to explore a "on-chain" and "off-chain" dual subscription and redemption mechanism in the future, and support 7×24-hour on-chain trading and receipt services. In addition, Zeng Yuchao, Managing Director of Futu Holdings, said that after the issuance of stablecoins, Futu will support the use of stablecoins on the platform. For example, users can use stablecoins as platform balances or holding assets to directly buy stocks, and Futu will handle the fiat currency clearing and settlement process for users. [Wu Blockchain]
